title: Best Sights & Attractions in Cinque Terre 2025

seo.title: Cinque Terre Sights 2025 | Must-See Attractions & Viewpoints
seo.description: Discover the best sights, attractions, historic churches, castles, viewpoints, and UNESCO heritage sites in Cinque Terre's five villages.

body.title: Must-See Sights & Attractions
body.subtitle: Historic churches, medieval castles, panoramic viewpoints, and iconic landscapes that make Cinque Terre unforgettable

features.title: Manarola Harbor Viewpoint
features.description: The most photographed vista in Cinque Terre with colorful houses cascading down to the sea

features.title: Vernazza Castle (Doria)
features.description: Medieval fortress offering panoramic views of the village and coastline from its tower

features.title: San Giovanni Battista
features.description: Beautiful Gothic church in Monterosso with rose window and artistic treasures

features.title: Corniglia Terrace
features.description: Belvedere Santa Maria offering sweeping views of vineyards and the Ligurian coast

features.title: Via dell'Amore
features.description: The legendary Lovers' Lane carved into cliffs between Riomaggiore and Manarola

features.title: Sanctuaries & Hermitages
features.description: Five hilltop sanctuaries above each village combining spiritual heritage with panoramic views

body.title: Discover More of Cinque Terre
body.description: Explore beaches, hiking trails, and authentic experiences across all five villages
